## StandardErc721.getOwnedTokenIds() method

Get Owned Token Ids

**Signature:**

```typescript
getOwnedTokenIds(walletAddress?: string): Promise<BigNumber[]>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter     | Type   | Description       |
| ------------- | ------ | ----------------- |
| walletAddress | string | <i>(Optional)</i> |

**Returns:**

## Remarks

Get all the token ids of NFTs owned by a specific wallet (no metadata)
